Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: In summary the people on Twitter are talking about the upcoming Budget 2023 and the focus is on gender equality and raising tax rates to benefit society's most disadvantaged. The Women's Economic Equality Taskforce and Mr. Ben Phillips are advocating for these issues. It's aimed at generating proactive actions from politicians ensuring transparency and cultivating a truth-centric mentality towards helping the Australians. Users also express dissatisfaction with the news filtered through Murdoch's press and tactfully question the need for IMF instructions about Austerity measures. All the while the people remain in love with Father Bob who receives a shout-out with no context.
